enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for either Physics 130-2 or 135-2.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS PHYSICS 136-2-63 General Physics Laboratory

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-226, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is a two hour weekly laboratory to be taken concurrently with Physics 130-2 or 135-2. Enrollment in a lab is required when registered for a Physics 130 or 135 lecture. Topics include electrostatics, magnetostatics, DC and AC circuits. On line pre-lab quizzes will be administered through CANVAS.

subject: PHYSICS
